title: Can we talk about blonde taric?
body:
http://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com/public/images/pages/2016/march/tre/img/Taric_Emerald_Splash_Wallpaper.jpg&resize=256:

????????

I dunno, it seems.... interesting, I dunno why they decided he needed a blond skin though, much less on my favorite taric skin.

removed e from blond because I are bad english.
